segments.text: Can you tell me where the pots and pans are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pots and pans are right over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I interest you in our store credit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . I already have credit cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But our credit card saves you 10 percent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here . Let me give you an application form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , but I'm just browsing today .
segments.speaker: S1
